regexEvaluator.descriptionCdata: 69c5e11d-2f62-488c-b02b-9c507dcb9088.description=Accepts signed or unsigned numbers. Accepts numbers with a period or comma as a decimal separater. Grouping separaters may be used; comma is expected when the decimal separator is a period, and vice-versa. \n Examples\: 342,124.8 | 2.333,4 | -0.1 | -1 | 0,1 | 1.0 | 0
regexEvaluator.name: numeric
